decks.notes: The deck focuses on using Song of Creation and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to create a powerful combo. By casting cheap artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Amber, players can draw cards and generate mana to cast more spells. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Malevolent Rumble provide additional card draw and removal, while Urza's Saga helps to search for crucial pieces of the combo. The goal is to quickly assemble the required cards to create a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent with card advantage and combo potential.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and manipulating the board state with card advantage. By utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and grind out a win through control. With cards like Thoughtseize for hand disruption and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student for card advantage, the deck is able to maintain control over the game and dictate the pace of play.

This deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards that tax their resources. Quantum Riddler and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd provide strong creatures to apply pressure, while Solitude and Consign to Memory offer removal options. Ephemerate can be used to protect key creatures or reuse powerful enter-the-battlefield effects. The deck also includes cards like Prismatic Ending and Spell Snare for additional disruption. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent while controlling the board to secure victory.

The deck focuses on using ramp and control elements to quickly bring out powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It also includes cards like Malevolent Rumble and Ugin's Labyrinth to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its high-impact threats while using removal and disruption to keep them off balance. With a combination of ramp, control, and powerful Eldrazi creatures, this deck creates a challenging and versatile gameplay experience.

This deck focuses on aggressive tactics, utilizing a mix of red, white, blue, green, and black cards to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The strategy revolves around playing efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, backed up by powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding help control the board, while Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provide additional threats. The deck aims to maintain pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan, securing victory through early aggression and efficient card choices.

The deck focuses on assembling the Amulet Titan combo quickly through ramp cards like Arboreal Grazer and Simic Growth Chamber, allowing you to cheat out powerful lands like Vesuva and Crumbling Vestige. The deck also includes utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Tolaria West to support its game plan. By utilizing cards like Primeval Titan and Scapeshift, the deck can quickly generate a large amount of lands and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. The deck aims to set up a strong board presence and win the game in a few explosive turns.

The deck focuses on using various cards to reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier instantly from the graveyard. It also includes cards that help protect the combo pieces, disrupt the opponent's strategy, and filter through the deck to find the necessary pieces. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo, either through self-mill or tutoring effects, to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats early in the game. Additionally, the deck includes some control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own combo pieces.

This deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Mine) to produce a large amount of mana quickly, allowing for powerful Eldrazi creatures to be cast. It also utilizes control elements such as Karn, the Great Creator, Thought-Knot Seer, and Ugin, Eye of the Storms to disrupt the opponent's strategy and maintain board control. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and disruptive spells while using the Tron lands to generate the necessary resources.

The deck focuses on quickly putting artifacts onto the battlefield and then using various spells and abilities to control the game while agressively attacking the opponent. It combines efficient creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Cori-Steel Cutter with powerful artifacts like Urza's Saga and Engineered Explosives to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also uses card draw and selection to find key pieces and keep the pressure on the opponent throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through utilizing powerful Eldrazi creatures and Tron lands. By assembling Urza's Tower, Power Plant, and Mine, the deck can generate large amounts of mana to cast devastating Eldrazi creatures such as Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. In addition, cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Karn, the Great Creator provide disruption and card advantage. The deck also includes various removal spells and artifacts to handle a variety of threats, making it a formidable control archetype in the Modern format.

The deck revolves around using cycling creatures and spells to fill up the graveyard, then casting Living End to bring back all the creatures from the graveyard to the battlefield. The deck aims to quickly fill up the graveyard with cycling cards like Street Wraith and bring back powerful creatures like Curator of Mysteries and Endurance to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Force of Negation to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the strategy of the deck is to control the game until it can execute the Living End combo for a powerful finish.

This deck aims to generate mana quickly through spells such as Manamorphose and Pyretic Ritual, utilizing Ruby Medallion to reduce costs. The goal is to cast Ral, Monsoon Mage and combo off with cards like Past in Flames and Grapeshot to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also includes card draw and filtering to help find combo pieces quickly. The presence of Wish allows for flexibility in finding the right card for any situation. Overall, the deck is designed to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game in a decisive manner.

This deck focuses on using a combination of creatures to synergize with Yawgmoth, Thran Physician in order to create powerful board states and generate card advantage. The toolbox approach allows for flexibility in fetching the right creature for the situation using Green Sun's Zenith, while also utilizing combo pieces like Malevolent Rumble and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of utility creatures like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Endurance provide additional options for dealing with various threats, making this deck versatile and adaptable in different matchups.

The deck focuses on utilizing the powerful UrzaTron lands to ramp up quickly and play big threats like Karn, Ugin, and Eldrazi creatures. It includes disruption spells like Thought-Knot Seer and Dismember to control the board and shut down opponents. With access to powerful artifacts like Mind Stone and Ugin's Labyrinth, the deck aims to establish board presence and overwhelming advantage to ultimately win the game. The combination of ramp, control, and powerful threats makes this deck a formidable force in the Modern format.

The deck focuses on utilizing Ruby Storm cards to generate mana quickly and efficiently, allowing for explosive turns that can lead to a win through combos or massive damage output. The deck aims to cast spells like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual to generate mana, while using Ral, Monsoon Mage to draw cards and deal damage. By utilizing various spells and abilities, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of powerful plays and finish the game in a swift and efficient manner.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to quickly build a board presence with powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Seasoned Pyromancer, and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, while using cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to remove blockers and deal direct damage. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Arena of Glory provide additional support and resilience. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Blood Moon and Thraben Charm to disrupt the opponent's game plan and secure victory.
